programme.title: Короткое слово нет
programme.desc: Они из разных миров. Тата – студентка художественной академии, Жека – вор и отчаянный авантюрист. Но эта история - не криминальный боевик или детектив. Это история любви. Настоящей. Такой, которая случается не у всех даже раз в жизни. Но им повезло. Они полюбили. И не повезло. Потому, что были из разных миров. Родители Таты делают все, чтобы разрушить их отношения. По следам Жеки идет полиция. Его арестовывают на глазах у любимой. Пройдут ли влюбленные испытания, которые выпали на их долю? Сохранят ли они свои чувства?

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Солнечные дни
programme.desc: Главная героиня Светлана мечтает стать актрисой и покорить большую сцену. Она упорно готовится к поступлению в театральное училище, но из-за волнения не сдает экзамены и заваливает главное выступление. Неожиданно слова поддержки девушке высказывает ее кумир - актер Артем Бовенко, который был членом приемной комиссии. Он отметил, что у Светланы есть талант и ей обязательно стоит попробовать вступить в следующем году. Но, увы, жизнь пошла по другому сценарию. Она выходит замуж и рожает ребенка. А через некоторое время муж оставляет ее с маленькой дочкой на руках. Какие теперь могут быть мечты об актерской профессии, когда нужно самостоятельно обеспечивать ребенка? Поэтому Светлана осваивает профессию риэлтора.

programme.title: Скажи мне правду
programme.desc: В центре сюжета – история обычной домохозяйки Анастасии. Ее благополучный мир, который она с такой любовью выстраивала, оказывается под угрозой: мужа Игоря арестовывают, а у маленькой дочки обнаруживают тяжелую болезнь. Настя не сдается и делает все, чтобы помочь близким. Но внезапно она узнает об изменах Игоря – и это становится для нее жестоким ударом. Как наша героиня поступит: простит супруга или начнет жизнь с чистого листа?

programme.title: Скажи мне правду
programme.desc: В центре сюжета – история обычной домохозяйки Анастасии. Ее благополучный мир, который она с такой любовью выстраивала, оказывается под угрозой: мужа Игоря арестовывают, а у маленькой дочки обнаруживают тяжелую болезнь. Настя не сдается и делает все, чтобы помочь близким. Но внезапно она узнает об изменах Игоря – и это становится для нее жестоким ударом. Как наша героиня поступит: простит супруга или начнет жизнь с чистого листа?

programme.title: Скажи мне правду
programme.desc: В центре сюжета – история обычной домохозяйки Анастасии. programme.title: Короткое слово нет
programme.desc: Они из разных миров. Тата – студентка художественной академии, Жека – вор и отчаянный авантюрист. Но эта история - не криминальный боевик или детектив. Это история любви. Настоящей. Такой, которая случается не у всех даже раз в жизни. Но им повезло. Они полюбили. И не повезло. Потому, что были из разных миров. Родители Таты делают все, чтобы разрушить их отношения. По следам Жеки идет полиция. Его арестовывают на глазах у любимой. Пройдут ли влюбленные испытания, которые выпали на их долю? Сохранят ли они свои чувства?

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Confidence: After Dark
programme.desc: What Jake Vig doesnt know just might get him killed. A sharp and polished grifter, Jake has just swindled thousands of dollars from the unsuspecting Lionel Dolby with the help of his crew: Insideman Gordo, Shills Miles, and Big Al--and two corrupt LAPD officers, Lloyd Whitworth and Omar Manzano. But when both Lionel and Big Al turn up dead, it becomes clear that Lionel wasnt just any mark--as Jake soon learns, he was an accountant for eccentric crime boss Winston King. Never one to shy away from a challenge, Jake offers to repay "The King" by pulling off the biggest con of his career. The mark? Morgan Gillette, a banker with deep ties to organized crime. With so much riding on the outcome, Jake decides to bring in a brash, blonde pickpocket named Lily, who joins the crew in a scheme involving corporate loans, creative accounting, wire transfers and off-shore accounts. Jake and his crew will have to stay one step ahead of both the criminals and the cops to finally settle their debt.

programme.title: Killerman
programme.desc: Moe Diamond, a money launderer struggling with memory loss sustained in a car crash, goes on the run, evading the police while carrying heaps of stolen cash he knows nothing about. Moe and his partner in crime Bobby "Skunk" Cohen had been given a job by Bobbys uncle Perico, wherein he gave them a sum of $20 million to launder. However, the two are ambushed while doing a side job by corrupt police officers. The two manage to escape the cops, but soon after end up in a car accident.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: Science fiction movie. Canadian sci-fi, produced in 2017. A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Citizen Verdict
programme.desc: Marty Rockman, producer of the hit reality show "So Sue Me," has a brand new concept: "Citizen Verdict." Every week, a real-life criminal case will be tried before the American people, but this time, they will also be the jury. If the defendant is found guilty in a death penalty case, Rockman will broadcast the execution.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. With no formal experience or education to speak of, she must rely on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: North and South: The Battle of New Market
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: In 1950, just a few months after North Korean forces have overrun most of South Korea, an American-led United Nations Command is deployed to Korea to aid the struggling South Koreans. General Douglas MacArthur devises a secret plan to attack behind enemy lines at the port city of Incheon. The risky strategy is opposed by leaders of the other military branches, forcing MacArthur to devise a clandestine operation to gather essential information from within occupied Incheon by coordinating a weeklong South Korean intelligence operation known as "X-Ray".

programme.title: Blakusparādības
programme.desc: Kad bez darba palikušo rakstnieku Ediju Morru (Bredlijs Kūpers) pamet draudzene Lindija (Ebija Korniša), viņš saprot, ka nākotne ir bezcerīga. Tomēr viss mainās, kad kāds sens draugs iedod Edijam izmēģināt NZT, psihotropu vielu, kas liek viņa smadzenēm pastiprināti darboties un kļūt neizmērojami pašpārliecinātam. Atrodoties NZT skurbulī, Edijs acumirklī uztver un izmanto visu, ko lasa, dzird vai redz. Edijs, kas vēl nesen bijis neveiksminieks un niecība, tagad nokļūst pašā finanšu pasaules virsotnē, kur piesaista biznesa magnāta Karla van Lūna (Roberts de Niro) uzmanību, kurš grib izmantot Edija spējas, lai nopelnītu miljardus. Taču baisās blakusparādības apdraud Edija augšupeju...

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.desc: Pārgājiens Lahemā nacionālajā parkā.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

Edijs, kas vēl nesen bijis neveiksminieks un niecība, tagad nokļūst pašā finanšu pasaules virsotnē, kur piesaista biznesa magnāta Karla van Lūna (Roberts de Niro) uzmanību, kurš grib izmantot Edija spējas, lai nopelnītu miljardus. Taču baisās blakusparādības apdraud Edija augšupeju...

programme.title: Pirmsākums
programme.desc: Doms Kobbs ir augstas klases spiegošanas profesionālis, kurš spēj iegūt vērtīgu informāciju no cilvēkiem, iekļūstot viņu sapņu pasaulē. Būdams ļoti pieprasīts korporatīvajā spiegošanā, Kobbs kļuvis par starptautiska līmeņa bēgli, kuru vajā gan konkurenti, gan arī likumsargi. Piekritis veikt pēdējo uzdevumu, Kobbs ar savu palīgu grupu iekļūst kāda jauna biznesmeņa sapņos. Ejot cauri daudzajiem līmeņiem vizuāli iespaidīgajā sapņu pasaulē, Kobbs cenšas rast atbildes uz pagātnes notikumiem savā personīgajā dzīvē, kā arī ar jebkuriem līdzekļiem perfekti paveikt ideālu noziegumu. Galvenajās lomās: Leonardo di Kaprio, Džozefs Gordons Levits, Eliots Peidžs.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. programme.title: Nopietns cilvēks
programme.desc: Divas Oskara balvas nominācijas - kā labākajai filmai un par labāko scenāriju. 1967. gads. Lerijs Gopniks, profesors ebreju koledžā, allaž centies būt nopietns, kārtīgs un likumpaklausīgs cilvēks. Taču nu vai visas iespējamās nelaimes nobrūk pār viņu - sieva paziņo, ka vēloties šķiršanos, juristu piesūtītie rēķini ir grandiozi, darbā saņemtas anonīmas apmelojošas vēstules, meita paslepus zog no viņa maka, krājot naudu deguna plastiskajai operācijai, dēls, izskatās, netiks galā ar iesvētīšanas ceremonijas pārbaudījumu... Tā visa Lerijam ir par daudz. Viņš izmisis meklē palīdzību, bet itin visur tiek atraidīts - psihoterapeits tikai atkārto, ka viss būs kārtībā (kaut pats taču aizvīlis projām Lerija sievu!), rabīns neuzskata par vajadzīgu Leriju pat uzklausīt!

programme.title: Oušena velna ducis
programme.desc: Denijam Oušenam un viņa bandai ir labs iemesls, lai realizētu ambiciozāko un riskantāko kazino aplaupīšanas plānu - viņiem jāaizstāv viens no savējiem. Taču šoreiz viņiem vajadzēs vairāk nekā tikai veiksmi, lai izputinātu Banku. Pēc sadursmes ar cietsirdīgo kazino īpašnieku Villiju Benku cietis viens no Oušena vīriem - Rubens smagā stāvoklī nonāk slimnīcā. Taču šoreiz uzņēmējs savos aprēķinos ir kļūdījies. Viņš ir uz laiku neitralizējis vienu no Oušena bandas, bet pamatīgi satracinājis pārējos bandas locekļus, dodot viņiem lielisku iemeslu atriebties. Un, kā zināms - atriebība ir salda. Galvenajās lomās: Džordžs Klūnijs, Breds Pits, Als Pačino.

programme.title: Amerikāņu afēra
programme.desc: Ir 1978. gads. Uzņēmējs un veikls blēdis Ērvings Rozenfelds kādā ballītē iepazīstas ar striptīza dejotāju Sidniju Proseri. Drīz vien abi kļūst par mīlniekiem, un Sidnija iesaistās Ērvinga afērās, uzdodoties par britu aristokrāti. Izmanīgais FIB aģents Ričijs pieķer abus afēristus un piespiež sadarboties, lai atmaskotu citu krāpnieku shēmas. Apstākļus vēl vairāk sarežģī Ērvinga neizdevusies laulība ar neirotisko Rozalīnu. Krimināldrāmas Amerikāņu afēra pamatā - viens no skaļākajiem krāpšanas skandāliem ASV septiņdesmito gadu beigās, kad vērienīgas FIB operācijas rezultātā tika atmaskotas plaša mēroga politiskās un biznesa krāpniecības shēmas.

programme.title: 7 dienas Entebē
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīta filma par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu un ķīlnieku krīzi. 1976. gadā tika nolaupīta Air France lidmašīna, kas bija ceļā no Telavivas uz Parīzi caur Atēnām, un piespiesta nosēsties Entebē, Ugandā. Pasažieri, kas bija ebreji, tika atdalīti no pārējiem, turēti kā ķīlnieki, un nolaupītāji pieprasīja atbrīvot teroristus, kas ieslodzīti Izraēlas cietumos. Pēc garām debatēm Izraēlas valdība uz Entebi nosūtīja elites vienību, lai atbrīvotu ķīlniekus. Galvenajās lomās: Zina Zinčenko, Bens Šnetcers, Daniels Brūls, Amirs Kori.

programme.title: Meitene vilcienā
programme.desc: Savā ikdienas braucienā uz Ņujorku nesen šķirtā Reičela Vatsone (Emīlija Blanta) gremdējas fantāzijās par māju, kurā viņa dzīvoja kopā ar bijušo vīru Tomu (Džastins Terū). Viņa ierauga jauno iedzīvotāju Meganu (Heiliju Benetu), kura ir satriecoši skaista sieviete un iemieso visu, ko Reičela jūt, ka ir zaudējusi. Atrodoties vilcienā, viņa ierauga vardarbīgu strīdu starp Meganu un vīru Skotu (Lūks Evanss). Reičela steidzas izkāpt no vilciena, taču viņai ir atmiņas zudums, iespējams, alkohola lietošanas dēļ. Viņa attopas asiņaina un klāta ar nobrāzumiem. Kad kļūst skaidrs, ka Megana ir pazudusi, viņa tiek ievilkta bīstamā intrigu un noslēpumu pasaulē, kas priekšpilsētā slēpta apkārtējo skatieniem.

programme.title: Rītdienas robeža
programme.desc: Zemi iekaro citplanētu iebrucēji, un pēc piecu gadu cīņām viņi ir gandrīz iekarojuši Eiropu. Ģenerālis Brigems (Brendans Glīsons) nosūta majoru Viljamu Keidžu (Toms Krūzs) kā dezertieri uz savu jauno vienību – J vadu. Jau pirmajā kaujā Keidžu nogalina, taču viņš šokēts atmostas iepriekšējā dienā. Izmisīgos centienos izlauzties no apnicīgās laika cilpas, Keidžu sāk trenēt elites kareive Rita Vrataski (Emīlija Blanta), kura ir cilvēces pretošanās simbols. Viņas vadībā Keidžs kļūst par Zemes labāko ieroci un iespēju, kā iznīcināt citplanētu iebrucējus.

programme.title: Ideālā Ferdinanda Čevala pils
programme.desc: Ševals ir pastnieks, kurš katru dienu ceļo pa Dromas upes apkārtni. Viņš satiek savas dzīves īsto sievieti Filomenu, un no viņu savienības piedzimst Alise. Tad viņš metas trakā azartspēlē: savām rokām uzcelt viņai neticamu pili.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Mīlestība Bretaņā
programme.desc: Lomās: Fransuā Damjāns, Sesila de Frānsa, Gijs Maršāns, Andrē Vilmss, Alise de Lankesēna, Estēbans. Ērvans ir atraitnis. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina, ka viņa tēvs nemaz nav viņa bioloģiskais tēvs. Ērvans uzmeklē Džozefu, vīru, kuru savulaik pazina viņa māte. Ceļojuma laikā Ērvans iepazīstas ar kādu apburošu būtni Annu. Taču drīz vien viss kļūst pagalam sarežģīti un Ērvanam ir jāizlemj, vai Anna viņam ir patiesi piemērota romantiskai saiknei.

programme.title: Ūdens forma
programme.desc: Godalgodais režisors un vizualizācijas meistars Giljermo Del Toro piedāvā aizkustinošu stāstu, kura darbība norisinās 1962. gadā - aukstā kara laikā ASV. Kādā slēgtā valdības laboratorijā strādā apkopēja Elaiza, kura kopā ar savu kolēģi Zeldu nejauši atklāj tur rūpīgi slēptu kādu neparastu būtni.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Kalinka
programme.desc: Sižets balstīts uz Andrē Bamberska, kurš 27 gadus cīnījās, lai tiktu notiesāts viņa meitas slepkava, dzīvesstāstu.

programme.title: Vai spēsi man kādreiz piedot?
programme.desc: Lī Israela pagājušā gadsimta 70. un 80. gados karjeru veidoja, profilējot slavenības, piemēram, Ketrinu Hepbērnu, Estē Lauderu vai žurnālisti Dorotiju Kilgalenu. Kad viņa to vairs nespēja, jo bija zaudējusi ķērienu mainīgās gaumes dēļ, viņa, lojālā drauga Džeka mudināta, pievēršas maldināšanai.

programme.title: Rozā sapņos
programme.desc: Stāsts par mīlestību fantāzijas pilnā pasaulē, kur mīļotie uz satikšanos lido rozā mākoņos un dejo grieztos, kur parastā dzīvoklī dzīvo saule un peles sarunājas ar kaķiem, kur ziedi aug cilvēkos un sirds siltums spēj iznīcināt visnāvējošākos ieročus.

programme.title: Kalinka
programme.desc: Sižets balstīts uz Andrē Bamberska, kurš 27 gadus cīnījās, lai tiktu notiesāts viņa meitas slepkava, dzīvesstāstu.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Cooking show.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Moos Craft Barbecue. Selena Gomez tries the best Texas BBQ in Los Angeles at Moos Craft Barbecue. Then, Selena puts her own spin on their meat-centric menu.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: The chefs travel to a Tuscan vineyard where they are challenged to create a three-course menu incorporating truffles and wine pairings.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is ready to relax outdoors in style as he prepares a classic trout dish, smoky potatoes, a flavourful salad and a bubbly cocktail.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Eddie Jackson surprises theatre teacher and home cook Derek with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to go up against famous chef and restaurateur Antonia Lofaso.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Its Noodle-palooza! Eddie Jackson hosts an epic battle between home cook, Drew, and celebrity chef, Amanda Freitag.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Home cook and former cheerleader Maria is in disbelief when she learns she will be facing off against world-renowned chef Eric Adjepong.

programme.title: Ranch To Table
programme.desc: Elizabeth invites friends and fellow moms to the ranch for a well-deserved night off. She cooks rib eye steaks and serves a walnut cake for dessert.

programme.title: Ranch To Table
programme.desc: With her boys out for the day, Elizabeth treats herself to her favourite sweet potato ravioli and molasses lace cookies with white chocolate filling.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldman and his team square off against Henderson Gonzalezs team to make ocean predator cakes that feature a floating element.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: "Targets" is a documentary project about the incredible strength of the human spirit. These are sincere confessions of soldiers, medics, and civilians who went through the hell of war, captivity, and severe injuries. Stories about how not to break down when it seems that everything is lost, and how the state helps heroes find their way back to life.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: 1988. gadā "Oskaram" nominētās cikla pirmās filmas turpinājums. Ņujorkas policists, tagad Losandželosas policijas darbinieks, Džons Makleins lidostā gaida savu sievu, kad pēkšņi ēkā iebrūk bruņoti tipi, kuri vēlas izglābt narkotirgoni, kas ir nogādāts ASV, lai tur stātos tiesas priekšā. Jau atkal Makleins iesaistās teroristu plānos, kurus izjaukt spēj tikai viņš…

programme.title: Lielais attālums
programme.desc: Kosmosa kuģirs avarē uz svešas planētas. Izdzīvojušajam astronautam jāšķērso skarbā planēta! Bēgot no nezināmām radībām, viņam jācenšas neiztērēt visu skābekli. Vienīgais kas viņu dzen uz priekšu, ir cerība satikt otru izdzīvojušo.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Strops satraukti dūc – nupat novākta vasaras medus raža. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai Medus spēlēs? Maijas jaukais satraukums zūd, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju piedalīties spēlēs, pārstāvot savu stropu. Cenzdamās pierādīt stropa karalienei, ko bites spēj, Maija apsola gūt uzvaru Medus spēlēs un glābt stropa medu. Karaliene piekrīt, bet atgādina, ka, vedot komandu cīņā, Maijai vispirms jāiemācās uzklausīt citus. Maija piedalās spēlēs kopā ar labāko draugu Villiju un seno biedru vaboļu komandu. Drīz viņa sastop skaudīgo bitīti Vijolīti no Zumtropoles, kura ar viltu cenšas atņemt Maijas komandai uzvaru. Bitītei nākas piedzīvot viltus rūgtumu, taču negodīgā Vijolīte un viņas komanda arī iekuļas ķibelē.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: Maģiskās durvis
programme.desc: Divi praktikanti Pols un Sofija uzsāk karjeru noslēpumainā Londonas uzņēmumā "J.W. Wells and Co". Drīz abi atklāj, ka viņu darba devēji, tostarp harizmātiskais izpilddirektors Hamfrijs Velss un menedžeris Deniss Taners, ievieš revolucionāras pārmaiņas – modernās korporatīvās stratēģijas te tiek apvienotas ar senām burvestībām. Uzņēmuma noslēpumam nākot gaismā, Sofijai un Polam tiek dots uzdevums: atrast spēcīgu maģisku artefaktu - durvis, kas ikvienu acumirklī var aizvest uz jebkuru vietu pasaulē. Tas izrādīsies mīklām, izaicinājumiem un pārdabiskām intrigām pilns ceļojums, jo izgaismos bīstamu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz "J.Wells and Co".

programme.title: Aptiekārs Melhiors
programme.desc: Viduslaiku krimināltrilleris par Tallinas aptiekāru, kuram jāatklāj noslēpums aiz briesmīgas slepkavību sērijas, kas apdraud visu kristīgo pasauli.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Kas mani ved pie tevis
programme.desc: Džeina un Vils, izdeguši savu iepriekšējo romantisko sattiecību dēļ, satiekas kāzās, un bremzes nostrādā tikai mirkli pirms abu seksa garderobē. Viņi nolemj izstāstīt viens otram par savu pagātni, zinot, ka iespēja būt kopā ir gandrīz neticama.

programme.title: Melnais lācis
programme.desc: Radošu krīzi piedzīvojoša filmu veidotāja meklē vienatni kādā lauku retrītā, taču saprot, ka mežs tikai piešķir spēku viņas iekšējiem dēmoniem.

programme.title: Misija: Izglābt tīģeri
programme.desc: Jauns supervaronis iedraudzējas ar apdraudētu tīģeri, ko sastapis piknika laikā mežā, un uzsāk drosmīgu glābšanas misiju.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Baksteru ģimene pārceļas uz dzīvi citā štatā, taču 10 gadus veco Finnu biedē jaunā māja, jo viņš uzskata, ka tajā spokojas. Kamēr puisēns izliek slazdus, lai notvertu "spoku", viņa vecāki aizkavējas citā pilsētas malā, un viņš paliek mājās kopā ar māsu. Tikmēr trīs zagļi vēlas iegūt ārkārtīgi dārgu gleznu, kuru bijušais īpašnieks paslēpis slepenā telpā. Vai viņiem izdosies iegūt kāroto un uzvarēt kaujā mazo gudrinieku?

programme.title: Džūlzs
programme.desc: Jo vecāks Miltons kļūst, jo dīvaināks viņš apkārtējiem šķiet. Ne gluži bīstams vai atbaidošs - taču pietiekami neparasts, lai pilsētiņas iedzīvotāji viņu neuztvertu nopietni. Tāpēc neviens, izņemot kaimiņienes Sendiju un Džoisu, Miltonam netic, kad viņš uzstāj, ka viņa dārzā avarējis NLO. Tomēr stāsts ir patiess, un citplanētiešu kuģa pilots, vārdā Džūlzs, pārceļas pie viņa uz dzīvi. Taču valdībai attiecībā uz Džūlzu ir citi plāni...

programme.title: Vīrs, kurš izgudroja Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Stāsts par to, kā Čārlzs Dikenss uzrakstīja "Ziemassvētku stāstu", kas kļuva par īstu Ziemassvētku gara atainojumu.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Grū ģimenē ir papildinājums - Grū juniors. Kad tētis Grū sastopas ar jaunu ienaidnieku – atriebīgo Maksimu Lemālu un viņa liktenīgo sievieti Valentīnu –, visa ģimene ir spiesta atstāt mājas, doties uz slepeno mītni skaistajā Meifloverā un mēģināt iekļauties vietējā sabiedrībā zem slepena vārda. Taču te ir kāds, kas zina, kas patiesībā ir Grū, un piedzīvojumi var sākties!

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Filmu "Ledus laikmets" un "Ledus Laikmets 2" varoņi ir atgriezušies - gatavi jauniem piedzīvojumiem. Skrets joprojām nododas nenotveramās zīles medībām. Menijs un Elija gaida mazuļa piedzimšanu, sliņķis Sids mēģina iztēloties ģimenes dzīvi, rūpējoties par nočieptām dinozaura olām, bet zobenzobu tīģeris Djego apsver, vai viņš nav kļuvis pārāk mīkstčaulīgs, tik daudz laika pavadot draugu kompānijā. Dodoties glābt nelaimē nokļuvušo Sidu, draugi nokļūst neparastā pazemes pasaulē, kur aci pret aci sastopas ar dinozauriem un ir spiesti cīnīties gan ar zvēriem, gan augiem.

programme.title: Līdz uzvaras vārtiem
programme.desc: Bez darba palikušais un alkoholu mīlošais futbola treneris Tomass Rongens dodas uz Amerikāņu Samoa, lai vadītu izlasi un palīdzētu tai sagatavoties Pasaules čempionāta atlases sacensībām. Galvenā problēma valstsvienības pastāvēšanas vēsturē: tā vēl ne reizi nav iesitusi nevienus vārtus un spēles laikā ir uzstādījusi antirekordu futbola vēsturē - 31 reizi vienas spēles laikā bumba ielaista viņu vārtos. Tomasu sagaida grūts darbs ne tikai ar komandu, bet arī pašam ar sevi.

programme.title: Blūmu ģimenes stāsts
programme.desc: Sema ir aktīvā dzīvesveida piekritēja, taču ģimenes ceļojumā pa Taizemi notiek nelaime – viņa neveiksmīgi nokrīt no balkona, savaino mugurkaulu un paliek daļēji paralizēta. Semas vīrs, trīs dēli un māte visādi mēģina palīdzēt un uzmundrināt sievieti, kura ir zaudējusi dzīvesprieku un slīgst arvien dziļāk depresīvā noskaņojumā. Pēkšņi mājas pagalmā uzrodas ievainots žagatas mazulis, kuru ģimene adoptē un nosauc par Pingvīnu. Neviens gan nebija iedomājies, ka tieši Pingvīns būs tas, kurš palīdzēs Semai atkal saskatīt dzīvei jēgu un atgūt optimismu.

programme.title: Pavadonis
programme.desc: Lai pārdzīvotu vispārējo kāzu drudzi, kas pārņēmis vasaru, divi neprecēti draugi Bens un Alise nolemj būt viens otra pavadoņi katrās kāzās, kurās viņi ir ielūgti.

programme.title: Aptiekārs Melhiors: Bendes meita
programme.desc: Viduslaiku trilleru trešajā filmā Melhiora sieva Keterlīna kļūst par liecinieci nežēlīgam uzbrukumam. Nezināma jaunekļa dzīvība tiek izglābta, taču cietušais, kurš zaudējis atmiņu, nezina, kas viņš ir un kā nonācis Tallinā. Uzbrukuma vietā atrastais gredzens aizved Melhioru pie Nakts brālības, bet dīvainā trupas izrāde Tirgus dienā rada vēl vairāk jautājumu. Baisas zīmes liecina, ka briesmas draud ne vien nezināmajam, kurš atgūstas no uzbrukuma, bet arī Melhioram un Keterlīnai, kuri viņu ārstē. Tajā pašā laikā pilsētā ierodas pāvesta sūtnis – nežēlīgs raganu mednieks.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Adaptācija
programme.desc: Pazīstams dramaturgs Čārlijs Kaufmans (Nikolass Keidžs) saņem pasūtījumu uzrakstīt filmas scenāriju pēc grāmatas "Orhideju zaglis" motīviem. Tajā žurnāliste Sūzena Orleāna (Merila Strīpa) apraksta avantūristu Džonu Laroču, kas ir tiesāts par īpašu orhideju zādzību no rezervāta. Nespēdams izdomāt scenārijam adekvātu sižeta noslēgumu Čārlijs piekrīt dvīņubrāļa piedāvājumam izsekot žurnālisti. Izrādās, ka grāmatā aprakstītie notikumi ievērojami atšķiras no realitātes un ziedu zagšanai ir pavisam citi iemesli. Sūzena izrādās iesaistījusies avantūrista Laroča dzīvē vairāk nekā parasta vērotāja no malas.

programme.title: Alarum
programme.desc: Silvestrs Stallone – spiegu trillerī. Precēts spiegu pāris slēpjas no varas iestādēm, kas meklē pazudušu cieto disku.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Real Madrid - AS Monaco
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. ASVEL - FC Barcelona

programme.desc: Each episode covers key moments from the games, statistics, strategies, as well as interviews with players and coaches. Its a show for true basketball fans who want to stay up to date with the latest trends and news from the world of sports.

programme.title: Cīņu sports: One Championship. ONE Fight Night
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Bayern - Augsburg
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: LaLiga. Sevilla - Athletic Bilbao
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC Žurnāls. Laika atskaite: Justin Gaethje-Paddy Pimblett
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: IBSF. PK. Altenberga. Bobslejs. Četrinieki. 2. brauciens (V)
Ligue 1. Marseille - Lens
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese take on one of their most eclectic houses yet with a fridge in the living room, an unusable kitchen and a hidden walled-off fireplace.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A Virginia couple, tired of staying with family while visiting Kill Devil Hills, wants their own piece of paradise. They would like something move-in ready with a fenced yard for their dogs that they can rent for a few years.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
programme.desc: Families who achieved their dreams of buying an affordable vacation home are now tasked with the tough job of turning it into the relaxing oasis they envisioned when they purchased it. In each episode of Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation , watch as they work together to transform their new properties into a home away from home, proving that with a little imagination and a lot of muscle, you can have the relaxing getaway youve always wanted.

programme.title: Island Life

Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a film crew discover proof of a dinosaur living in the African Congo? Are reports of the strange lights above the Hessdalen Valley in Norway a sign of extraterrestrial activity? And has NASA uncovered proof of an alien structure on an asteroid?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a film crew discover proof of a dinosaur living in the African Congo? Are reports of the strange lights above the Hessdalen Valley in Norway a sign of extraterrestrial activity? And has NASA uncovered proof of an alien structure on an asteroid?
